    This API provides the functionality to access, manage and store device topologies.

        public java.util.List<org.example.topologyapi.Topology> queryTopologies()
        This method is used to query all the topologies stored in the memory.
        Returns:
        a list of topologies stored in memory

      • deleteTopolgy

        public java.util.List<org.example.topologyapi.Topology> deleteTopolgy​(java.lang.String topologyId)
        This method is used to delete a topology from the memory given its id.
        Parameters:
        topologyId - the string id of a topology you want to delete
        Returns:
        a list of topologies in the memory after deletion.

      • queryDevices

        public java.util.List<org.example.topologyapi.Component> queryDevices​(java.lang.String topologyId)
        this method is used to get the list of devices in a topology given its id.
        Parameters:
        topologyId - the string id of a topology in memory
        Returns:
        list of components in the topology

      • queryDevicesWithNetlistNode

        public java.util.List<org.example.topologyapi.Component> queryDevicesWithNetlistNode​(java.lang.String topologyId,
                                                                                     java.lang.String netListNodeId)
        this method is to get the device list of a topology given its id and the id of a component.
        Parameters:
        topologyId - the string id of a topology in memory
        netListNodeId - the string id of a component in the topology
        Returns:
        a list of components of the topology

      • writeJSON

        public java.nio.file.Path writeJSON​(org.example.topologyapi.Topology topology)
        this method is used to write a topology to a json file.
        Parameters:
        topology - topology object to be jsonified
        Returns:
        the path to the json file produced

      • readJSON

        public org.example.topologyapi.Topology readJSON​(java.nio.file.Path filePath)
                                          throws java.io.IOException
        this method is used to read a file and parse it into an object and add to topology list.
        Parameters:
        filePath - the path of the json file to be read
        Returns:
        a topology object produced from the file
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - throws an exception if the file is not found.
